      • SSLConf

        public SSLConf()

    • 方法详细资料

      • make

        public static long make(long pool,
                        int flags)
                 throws Exception
        Create a new SSL_CONF context.
        参数:
        pool - The pool to use.
        flags - The SSL_CONF flags to use. It can be any combination of the following: 
         SSL.SSL_CONF_FLAG_CMDLINE
 SSL.SSL_CONF_FLAG_FILE
 SSL.SSL_CONF_FLAG_CLIENT
 SSL.SSL_CONF_FLAG_SERVER
 SSL.SSL_CONF_FLAG_SHOW_ERRORS
 SSL.SSL_CONF_FLAG_CERTIFICATE
        返回:
        The Java representation of a pointer to the newly created SSL_CONF Context
        抛出:
        Exception - If the SSL_CONF context could not be created
        另请参阅:
        OpenSSL SSL_CONF_CTX_new, OpenSSL SSL_CONF_CTX_set_flags

      • free

        public static void free(long cctx)
        Free the resources used by the context
        参数:
        cctx - SSL_CONF context to free.
        另请参阅:
        OpenSSL SSL_CONF_CTX_free

      • check

        public static int check(long cctx,
                        String name,
                        String value)
                 throws Exception
        Check a command with an SSL_CONF context.
        参数:
        cctx - SSL_CONF context to use.
        name - command name.
        value - command value.
        返回:
        The result of the check based on the SSL_CONF_cmd_value_type call. Unknown types will result in an exception, as well as file and directory types with invalid file or directory names.
        抛出:
        Exception - If the check fails.
        另请参阅:
        OpenSSL SSL_CONF_cmd_value_type

      • assign

        public static void assign(long cctx,
                          long ctx)
        Assign an SSL context to a SSL_CONF context. All following calls to apply(long, String, String) will be applied to this SSL context.
        参数:
        cctx - SSL_CONF context to use.
        ctx - SSL context to assign to the given SSL_CONF context.
        另请参阅:
        OpenSSL SSL_CONF_CTX_set_ssl_ctx

      • apply

        public static int apply(long cctx,
                        String name,
                        String value)
                 throws Exception
        Apply a command to an SSL_CONF context.
        参数:
        cctx - SSL_CONF context to use.
        name - command name.
        value - command value.
        返回:
        The result of the native SSL_CONF_cmd call
        抛出:
        Exception - If the SSL_CONF context is 0
        另请参阅:
        OpenSSL SSL_CONF_cmd

      • finish

        public static int finish(long cctx)
        Finish commands for an SSL_CONF context.
        参数:
        cctx - SSL_CONF context to use.
        返回:
        The result of the native SSL_CONF_CTX_finish call
        另请参阅:
        OpenSSL SSL_CONF_CTX_finish
